subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ young ace allowed only a slowly rolling infield hit with two outs in the seventh, yet left without a win after nine scoreless innings. Mike Baxter drove in the winning run in the 10th.
snippet: The Mets’ young ace allowed only a slowly rolling infield hit with two outs in the seventh, yet left without a win after nine scoreless innings. Mike Baxter drove in the winning run in the 10th.
